content: One of the data types eligible for a Quantity search is Range, but the Quantity search spec doesn't really say much about how this is handled. It does reference #prefix which implies the modifiers eb/sa are valid. Is this identical to how Date search works on Period? I think this would benefit from some clarifying examples.
well, every quantity is implicitly a range. So searching on range isn't any different
hmm, I guess that's true - so even for a Number search on a Decimal one could use sa/eb?
